addon.description: With this script you can edit specific lines, move or stretch subtitles, and synchronize with other subtitles. You can also synchronize with a videofile.
addon.name: Sublissimo
addon.news:
Version 0.0.2
 - New: Frame rate conversion on the fly
 - New: Play modified subtitle directly on video
 - Minor bugfixes
 
 Version 0.0.3
 - New: Added support for .sub files
 - Minor bugfixes
addon.summary: Edit and synchronize subtitles with your remote
